content: Hi! Welcome to XYZ Services. Thanks for reaching out for plumbing assistance. Can I get your name to start your booking?
My name is Aaron, and I need a plumber RIGHT NOW. Don’t tell me to wait days or even hours—someone comes in the next 30 minutes or I’m calling your competitor.
Thanks, Aaron. Can I get your address to see how quickly we can get someone to you?
I’m at 1330 Davis Ave. You better not make me repeat it.
Thank you, Aaron. I am checking if we have anyone available to reach 1330 Davis Ave within the next 30 minutes.
Aaron, our soonest available plumber can reach you in about 1 hour. Would you like me to book this appointment, or would you like to hear other options?
No, that’s NOT good enough. You get someone here in 30 minutes or less. That’s what I said. Find someone or I’m done.

I understand this is urgent, Aaron. I’ve checked all nearby teams, and the quickest available is 1 hour. Unfortunately, no one is closer at this moment. Shall I reserve this slot just in case, or would you like me to keep checking?
I said 30 minutes, not an hour. You people never listen. Whatever, just book your hour slot if you can’t do better.

Booking your appointment for an arrival in approximately 1 hour at 1330 Davis Ave. You will receive a reminder before the plumber arrives. Is there any other information I should pass on to the technician?
